---
title: "Reproduction checklist"
---

**Set-up**

* ✅ Create repository using template
* ✅ Upload journal article and all artefacts to repository
* ⬜ Select license

**Scope of reproduction**

* ⬜ Read the journal article
* ⬜ Make consensus decision on scope
* ⬜ Compile items in scope
* ⬜ Archive scope and supporting documents on Zenodo

**Familiarise with artefacts**

* ⬜ Describe code/data
* ⬜ Search for code that produces items in scope
